entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking change in environment variable configuration prefix support in dotnet 6 #61577
  • Enabled AOT blazor Wasm Precompilation fails. #61565
  • WriteEventCore with DateTime has changed behavior in .Net 6.0 #61563
  • Consider using a faster memset #61561
  • MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61560

Closed

  • Building .NET Core 3.0 RTM on FreeBSD #31039
    Future
  • System.Text.Json deserialization bug #61550
  • [mono][aot] Static virtual interface methods do not work with generic sharing #54910
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete `impCheckForNullPointer` #61576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update workflow docs to indicate ARM64 macOS works #61575
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: don't import IL for partial compilation blocks #61572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix range checks for "i >= 0 && i < cns" patterns #61569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Improve System.Speech trimmability #61566
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Extend RegexCharClass.Canonicalize range inversion optimization #61562
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix CharInClass reference in regex emitter #61559
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Enable 54910 tests #61564
    community-contribution
  • Add [Fact] attributes to JIT regression tests #61540
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes to methodical JIT tests #61536
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes on TypeGeneratorTests #61534
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable new analyzers in global configs #60914
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1468915 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/5.0] Credscan addition to #61371 #61511
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [arm64] JIT: Add with sign/zero extend #61549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Remove the "anything + null => null" optimization #61518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.Default #61434
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • ConcurrentBag AddRange proposal implementation #61557
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [CS8629]: LINQ .Where calls are not considered #57757
  • Unexpected behavior when compiling a project with an error from the roslyn analyzer #57357
    17.1

Updated

  • .NET 6 release broke switch expression formatting #57736
  • Invalid parsing of interpolated strings with curly braces followed after interpolation with format specifier #57750

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57756
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57754
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Don't show nullable annotation in completion items of static field/property #57744
    Area-IDE
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, 17.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow developers to use Dependency Injection within components the same way DotNetCore does with everything else. #38385
  • @inject IWebHostEnvironment Environment in Page not working in .NET 6 #38384
  • POSTing array into an "object" action parameter does not work #38383
  • Debugging Blazor WASM in VSCode Holds Debug Session and Ports Open #38382
  • Auto insert of attribute quotes not working for razor pages #38381
  • Ambiguous Routes #38380
  • How to solve "Invalid Emulator component" issue in Mobile Blazor Bindings #38379
  • CSS Isolation not works for nested CSS selector #38377
  • CSS Isolation not works for Img elements #38376
  • Resources built for razor library are not copied to publish folder #38374
  • ViewEngine.FindView does not find view in Razor Class Library #38373
  • razor class libraries including javascript files when consuming them via nuget in .net 6 #38371
  • [Question] DistributedSession CommitAsync #38370
  • Blazor Custom Elements not rendering RenderFragment content in an angular app #38369

Closed

  • Listing IdentityUserClaims returns an entry multiple times. #38361
  • Perf improvement: json_actix #38352
  • Why are so many useless things generated? How to modify and delete them? #38337

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Helix queues #38372
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Verify DI trimming in unit tests #38142
    area-infrastructure
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #26676
  • [Q] Usage of typeMappingSource in SqlServerPropertyExtensions.GetValueGenerationStrategy #26674
  • Cannot add new migrations in .NET 6 EF Core #26673

Closed

  • M1 macOS monterey: dotnet-ef fails with libhostfxr.dylib could not be found #26663
  • How I can create a new entity class from my context by entity name #26675
  • Move Thread_safety_in_relational_command_cache out of QueryBugsTest #25815
    MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0.1] Use a unique identifier for variables during insert #26679
  • Use EqualsExact in DefaultDateTimeOffsetValueComparer #26678
  • Add considering default schema when enabling Temporal tables. #26677

Merged

  • Make concurrent test use different connections #26670

Updated

  • Query: Introduce method for providing brackets around SqlExpression b… #26660
  • Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
